thread.title: OT: I'm honestly not sure what to think about this (KJ)
thread.title_full: OT: I'm honestly not sure what to think about this (KJ)

author: Dan H
title: OT: I'm honestly not sure what to think about this (KJ)
text: OT: I'm honestly not sure what to think about this (KJ) Stumbled upon this story. http://deadspin.com/im-a-grown-up-no...son-1732538782 I remember being reflexively defensive of KJ back when the first allegations came out, but man. This other stuff doesn't sound good at all. And in a day and age when the dang Subway guy turns out to be a skeeve, who the heck knows. Thoughts? "To take from one because it is thought that his own industry and that of his father's has acquired too much, in order to spare to others, who, or whose fathers have not exercised equal industry and skill, is to violate arbitrarily the first principle of association--'the guarantee to every one of a free exercise of his industry and the fruits acquired by it.'" - Thomas Jefferson Last edited by Dan H; Today at 05:01 AM .
